I love how the woman tied up at least seems to love being there, and also the idea of the fluid she gets filled up with goes on to make the other women grow when it shoots out of her tits. While I wish they wouldn't grow to mountainous blobs, I like the detail given to when they're still at large but moderate sizes (at least in comparison to the sizes they eventually grow to).
